REPORT TO THE FORD FOUNDATION
FROM THE
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
I. INTRODUCTION
This report is a final statement of activities carried on by the NAEB with
funds generously provided by the Ford Foundation in its last grant, dated June
27, 1957.
Believing that the Foundation might desire a broader view of all activi¬
ties carried on with funds granted to the NAEB by both the Fund For Adult Edu¬
cation and the Ford Foundation itself, however, we have attempted to estab¬
lish a broader perspective by including briefly also some reference to other
activities of the NAEB since 1951, when a national office for educational broad¬
casting was made possible by a grant from the W. K. Kellogg Foundation.
The material presented is organized by projects and activities, with
an index to make possible quick reference by Foundation officials with par¬
ticular interest in any one of the grant projects involved. If there are any
additional questions, we shall consider it a privilege to provide whatever other
data or explanations are desired.
